website_summaries.verdict: From the durable soft knit material to stylish design, these leg warmers do a good job keeping you warm and comfortable on chilly days and seem to hold up well over time.
pros: Stands out for its comfortable and high-quality cotton and spandex material
Customers appreciate how the soft knit doesn't pile easily
cons: Several shorter people found these socks to be a bit too long

customer_reviews.title: Big Feet, Look No Further!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I wear a size 12WW and I am 6'0. Sooooo... as cute as this style is and as much as I wanted to be part of it, there's nowhere short of hand-made for $65 a pair that I could participate in this adorable fashion trend. I've looked for over a year. These were cheap enough, even though other reviews are these small feet and short folks, I decided to try it anyway since the mention it stretches. HALLELUJAH THEY FIT!!! They are so soft & they stretch plenty big for my giant's body. I could have been 6'2 and comfortably worn them. They are pretty thin, but very soft... and I am going to go buy several pairs. YAYAYAYA!
customer_reviews.author: Barlow Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide calves (17.5) and got a pair from another brand and they stretch to the max, still almost killed my circulation and after wearing them once, they would not go back to their original size. These toppers are awesome - they are more like a sock, so they stretch and go back to their size. They don't strangle your leg. They are exactly as shown, very cute - button detail. I love them and I am buying some more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Anais Ron C.

customer_reviews.title: I have been disappointed in the past with some leg-warmers/socks that didn't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: My calves are a little larger than some (though I don't need wide-calf boots). I have been disappointed in the past with some leg-warmers/socks that didn't fit my calves well (or they looked funny). This pair of socks is very stretchy and I was able to wear them over my skinny jeans. Very pretty - and I am very pleased. I will be ordering in additional colors. (side note: they are pretty thin - so I may wear a warmer pair of socks over them if I plan to be outside in cold weather for an extended amount of time)
customer_reviews.author: Saints Fan

customer_reviews.title: LONG! But So Cute.
customer_reviews.text: I really love how delicate these socks are, apparently I have large calves and something thick would have meant I couldn't zip my boots up. The color is spot on with how it is advertised. They are super long! Maybe I have short legs, ha ha, bit they would easily come up mid thigh. I have room in the ankles of my boots for the extra fabric. Super cute though and just what I was hoping for. Arrived sooner than promised.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hager

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit 15" calf.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15" calf. All muscle. I read a question from a potential customer asking if it would fit their calf and if it was stretchy. The seller said it fit up to 17" and had some stretch. Well up top where the lace is has NO STRETCH. it is extremely tight around my calf and I had to force it up my calf. I was hoping to wear it it with leggings but I doubt I can. The bottom portion has a bit of stretch to it though. I recommend these for tiny little legs. So sad. :(
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute but One Sock Didn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: Pros: • The buttons on both socks were on the correct side (a lot of the reviews I had read said that one of the socks had the buttons on the wrong side of the sock) • The socks are definitely cute! Cons: • The lace on the top of the socks are different sizes. One of them was definitely smaller than the other, so one sock fit okay, but the other one was too small to pull all the way up my calf. I thought maybe I just had uneven sized calfs (hahah) so I tried them on the opposite foot, but same results. Really disappointed in the quality control of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Just to note, the "lace" at the top does ...
customer_reviews.text: Just to note, the "lace" at the top does NOT stretch, so if you are a bigger girl or have larger calves, it'll be a squeeze getting these up. Once you get them under the knee they are ok, but you may want to pull the stitches and give yourself a little more room.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A Showell

customer_reviews.title: Cute Socks
customer_reviews.text: I like these stockings but I don't love them. First of all they will not keep your feet and legs warm. They are a fashion stocking not a winter stocking. They are quite large and long for me. I am 5'2" for reference and the stockings come half way up my thigh. They do stay on however, and don't fall down, which was a big surprise to me. I wear a size 6 shoe and found that the foot of the stockings gathered around the heel. I think if these stockings were made for a smaller shoe size I would find myself buying more. For now this is a one time purchase only.
customer_reviews.author: Real_Irishlady

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Roomy for Muscular Calves
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, soft and beautiful! I bought these to go with my dirndl dress. They are long and soft and reach to below my knees just like I need them to. I have large calves but the socks didn't mind. The elastic is snug enough to keep the socks up but not cut off circulation. The lace and button detail are cute. They are also quality so I know if I wash by hand and take care of them, they will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love them they are super cute with my short boots now I can wear them with a dress, shorts, and Jean's. I will have to try them with high boots too I think they'll look just as cute. Love the color and the material is not heavy i don't think they will make your legs or feet sweat. Will be ordering more of these in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: TammySki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I just have large calves so they are a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: longer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: - 1. much longer than anticipated, they reach over my knees 2. they are truly ivory, which is pretty, but the photo appeared lighter in colour + 1. so soft! 2. so beautiful! 3. they can be scrunched comfortably inside my boots to place them where I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Dale Kern

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased that these socks were wide enough in the calf (I'm one of those wide-calf boot kind of girls) without getting too scrunched up. The height is awesome: while they don't go over the knees (I'm 5'6), they go right to the knees, which means I can wear them with pretty much any boots. I will say, though, having wide calves means these are just tight enough that I don't like to wear them mid-calf with lower boots. I could, but then the socks feel too tight. Higher boots are great though.
customer_reviews.author: LittleJoSleep

customer_reviews.title: Not Modern Boho?
customer_reviews.text: I had previously got a regular sock, and they had Modern Boho on the packaging. They are very comfortable and worked great with boots, even on a warm day. However then I also ordered a pair of the cuffs. The brand on them is “ourworld boutique“. They may be the same quality (I did not open and am sending back), however not the Modern Boho as in the listing several times, and pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but very long!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, but I am 5'3" and these would be knee-high stockings if I pulled them up all the way! I am keeping them and will just cut the access off and sew them, because I don't want to go through the trouble of returning them and they definitely are cute...but there is about 6+ inches of extra materials at my toes when I pull these up to my knees. Fellow short ladies: Please keep this in mind when buying!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Duhaime

customer_reviews.title: Great socks for boots
customer_reviews.text: So I have big athletic calves that tend to swell and after reading reviews I was afraid these wouldn’t fit. To my surprise they fit perfectly not tight at all room for my swelling prone legs without constricting. These go to my knees and I can easily pull them over and probably wear these with thigh high boots.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: 2 left socks
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute however, I got 2 left socks. The buttons on both socks were on the left side. I didn't feel like going through the hassle of returning them so I cut off the buttons and extra piece of lace. I left the lace at the very top and they are still cute. They are thin and seem delicate but I wouldn't have wanted them any thicker or they would not have fit comfortably in my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Love these boot cuffs!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. I love that they are long enough to touch my regular ugly sock if it's pulled up the whole way, so I have a full sock without the work of a full sock. I feel I can wear these a few times before washing them (unlike regular socks-yay!). They don't slip at all and don't cut off circulation. I have a very slightly wider than medium (I would guess) calf with an actual 15 and 1/8" size at the widest point measured against skin. I think most people would be happy with this though, as the way it's knit offers appropriate stretch-ability
customer_reviews.author: lilrazdaz

customer_reviews.title: Cute with boots!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these over my skinny jeans and under boots, mid calf or knee high. The only problem is the bow on one of the socks was sewn onto the line that goes between the white part of the sock so it's not as firmly put on but if you can sew or get someone to do it for you, just tighten it up. Otherwise these socks are cute with boots. they are thin so you might want to wear with another pair of socks on cold days. I wear a par of crew sock under them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but long and a little thin
customer_reviews.text: These socks are adorable but as others have stated, they are also incredibly long. I'm 5'2" tall and I have to scrunch the socks down in my boots when wearing so the tops show correctly. The color is exactly as it shows online in the grey (it's the only color I've ordered so far). I do think they are a little thin for wearing alone as my feet tend to get cold very easily, so I always wear them with a pair of short athletic socks. They definitely look cute with any pair of riding boots and are absolutely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SmooreTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These work quite well, and look very nice with my boots which were rubbing my leggings till they had an ugly halo of roughed up raggedness. This has prevented that unsightly problem on my new leggings and look cute to boot. I was kind of surprised at how small around they were. I have pretty small calves (maybe not as small as the tiny model in the picture, but still small) and they fit a little more snugly than I had expected. I imagine if my calves were much larger these would be a bit uncomfortable. Just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but didn't fit my wide calves well.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, but not very cute on me. I have wide calves and purchased these after reading reviews saying they fit other people's wide calves. Mine are 14.5" and I find these uncomfortable to wear because the lace part is too tight on my calf. They also look pretty stretched out when I wear them. I don't recommend them for wide calves.
customer_reviews.author: Calid

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: This are the cutest socks I have ever seen. They are a lovely cream color, and almost too pretty to wear! The sock is thin, like a thick stocking. The details are beautiful and workmanship is quality. I can't wait to wear these with my boots! I have muscular calves and these fit great, but they are very stretchy and would probably fit someone with smaller calves. Also, they are quite long, so will probably work for all lengths of legs, as shorter limbed ladies can scrunch them down in their boots. Love these socks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Child size
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my great niece for Christmas. Far too small for an adult woman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional.
customer_reviews.text: I had white ones of these for a long time that are shorter and worked well. I ordered the longer red ones. Never wore them upside down, that seems like the lace would bunch up. I have 15” calves and they fit me just fine and don’t slide down or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Key

customer_reviews.title: Great looking socks
customer_reviews.text: Great looking socks, but unfortunately one sock came smaller than the other. Don't know if it was just a defect or if they put one smaller size sock in with a larger size sock. The smaller one is slightly uncomfortable, but the bigger one fits perfect, so figured I would keep them.
customer_reviews.author: caitishea

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but be careful washing
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look. After one gentle wash cycle in a protective mesh bag, however, the lacy piece at the top started to come off. I still wear them since it's not too noticeable and I tied off the loose threads so it wouldn't get worse (at some point when I have more time, I'll fix them properly with needle and thread). So, be warned, they are not very well made. But they are cute. I would recommend hand-washing if you have the time.
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy knee high socks fits large calves
customer_reviews.text: I love these 100% cotton knee high socks. They are really soft and comfy. I put them in the washer and dryer and they did not shrink and kept their shape. I would suggest these to anyone who has big calves/ Mine are 15 inches they fit perfect. They stretch to fit great. They have a fully formed toe and heel so are comfortable to wear. I bought them to wear under pants in the winter to keep my legs warmer. They are pretty and color is same as picture.
customer_reviews.author: nyer566

customer_reviews.title: So warm and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got these socks just before a camping trip up north in the fall time when the temps were in the 30s and 40s. As someone who is always, always cold I expected to be miserable but these socks did a phenomial job keeping my toes and feet warm and looked so cute with my boots! I highly recommend this product to stay warm in the fall/winter.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Might be nice
customer_reviews.text: But who knows because these are NOT good for women with big calves. I mean they technically made it up to my knee but looked like a rubberband tied around a stress ball. The material was soft and the lace was pretty but it wasn't meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lace can’t stretch.  Very poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Lace top has no stretch so they will NOT go past my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Sunia Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Details are totally misaligned
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but the button details on one sock are on the side, the other sock is right smack dab in the middle at the knee. So, won't be showing off the tops of these. Rather poor quality control in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: heather rankin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for, for our fall family pictures! The color was an exact match to my husband's shirt which was what I wanted. Unfortunately these are not made for wide calves which is the reason I gave a 4 star instead of 5. I had to stretch the top to make them fit my calf and even then they were still really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy.
customer_reviews.text: The socks look cute but they hurt the bottom of my feet from walking in them. They are a bit chunky and rub my skin weird. They didn’t shrink in the wash which is a plus, but I won’t wear them often because they are just uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KJayne

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and they matched my boots really well. I have really wide calves and they still fit. They don't look exactly like the product photo but they do look exactly like what socks would look like if I was actually wearing them so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Dressy
customer_reviews.text: Cute Sock Design Good Quality Stretches to fit my calf perfectly without scrunnching down sock to get by Perfect with dresses and skirts with shoes or boots
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Fits exact sock size, well made, great material &  looks cute as a button!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to add some “cuteness” to my rubber boots & these worked marvelously! Only draw back is “hand washing”. Although you might be able to “machine wash”, they seem a little too heavy of a material for that so I hand washed. Did not lose color or shape...Very 😀 pleased!
customer_reviews.author: rasintexas

customer_reviews.title: cute but snug around the top
customer_reviews.text: Super cute socks, nice quality only issue is they are a bit snug around the top and I don't have huge calves. I stretched the top little to loosen them up otherwise they are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Cute cuffs
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a problem fitting them over my calf or knee, the knit part actually loosened a tad as I wore them. I've worn them with high and low boots as well. They were delivered on time and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable and comfy but not made with decent buttons honestly
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and comfy but not made with decent buttons honestly, they are crap! After only wearing once I noticed one of the buttons broke in half, then the second time I wore them another broke in half on the same leg warmer as the previously broken button!!!
customer_reviews.author: LJax

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love the black and white Fair Isle design. They are soft and warm! I am a bit concerned that the label says you have to wash by hand, who does that anymore? I hope they don't stretch out if I have to hand wash. Normally leg warmers stretch out and the dryer is the only way to get them back into shape. Other than that I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RSGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Fit like compression socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I am a large woman with a size 11 foot. I wear them with boots or just around the house. Wonderful socks . I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love the Cuffs
customer_reviews.text: These cuffs are so cute. They fit very well too. I do not have really skinny calves, more on the full side, but the cuff fit me well. I will hand wash and air dry however. Can't wait for the cooler weather to wear these with boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart :(
customer_reviews.text: I love these so very much. I love the color, love the buttons and love the fit. Sadly I wore once and they are already falling apart. The stitching is completely unraveling and there is no stopping it. I know they surely wouldn't hold up to washing. I'd love to say 5 stars, but after only wearing once they are obviously not going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Mandamay

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Rolled, didn't stay in place - at all. After hand washing, the lace started to separate from the knit. Waste of money, wont be able to wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: amyolier

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute socks! Love the lace and bow. They were actually taller than I expected. I am able to wear them above or below my knees and I have fairly long legs and typically wear a 34 inseam in pants. So, these were great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: they were of good quality and appear to be well made
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a boot sock for a tween. Unfortunately, I can't rate a 5-star because I don't know if they stretch out or not and have not yet washed them. Upon receiving them, they were of good quality and appear to be well made. The color is true. It's so hard to shop for cute in that 7-14 size range and these fit the bill perfectly. They're not so grown up looking yet they aren't something for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: I love them, they fit perfectly but I think I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them, they fit perfectly but I think I got two left feet? I though the buttons were supposed to be on the outside of your calf...one was and the other one was on the inside of my leg. I just twisted the one till the buttons were on the outside. Other than that I would give five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Heydorn

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but I have thick calfs and they don’t fit. The lace trim doesn’t stretch. I’m going to give them to my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with how high quality these socks are. They're not super thin like most boutique style boot socks but also not too thick. I ordered as a gift for someone but will be ordering for myself now too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Large calves need to look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Too small means they were too small around my calves. They are so cute, and the length is great (just what I wanted). There just isn't any give on the top seam. I couldn't get the cuff over my calf without pants on. If you have trouble finding socks to go over your calves, these won't work for you. Giving them to my skinny legged daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lamanite

customer_reviews.title: They ar very pretty and I like them
customer_reviews.text: These fit my calves and I have 16" calves. They ar very pretty and I like them. I haven't worn them long but I think after they have been on awhile they may be a little stretched out. Overall, I really like them
customer_reviews.author: BinNM

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot Socks!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of boot socks I have bought from this company. The socks are great. They are soft to the touch. They are snug but not too snug so they fit well around my calves. I haven't wore them over leggings or jeans yet, which is the plan when it gets colder. They wash up just fine too. I washed them in cold water and tumble dried low in the dryer. No wear or tear. I think this is a great product. I'm sure I will buy other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, great color, just as it looks in pics. Fits just at the knee cap. Great quality. So adorable would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It feels like a string is tied around your leg at the ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is very stretchy and fits loosely except for the top where the lace is. It feels like a string is tied around your leg at the top of it. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: These were super cute boot socks! I bought for my 12 year old. They were a little long & went over her knee but she liked that look! She can easily scrunch if she wants them shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture - not for thick legs.
customer_reviews.text: they look just like the picture and were delivered on time. However because they are knitted they do not stretch very well. I bought them for myself, but due to my chunky calves (5'1" - 215lbs) they did not stretch high up my legs and were covered by my boots, which defeated the purpose for me. I gave them to someone with skinner calves (5'1" - 140lbs) and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Such a great purchase. Vert nice quality. I have thick calves and these fit. They are snug but will work.
customer_reviews.author: Japauley

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute but only for a few wears! Come apart easily but they are very cute. Maybe if you hand wash them every time like the instructions say. I just don’t have the patients
customer_reviews.author: Bella Reed

customer_reviews.title: they look exactly like the picture and are super soft and delicate looking
customer_reviews.text: These are so flipping cute! they look exactly like the picture and are super soft and delicate looking, but they are made of some sturdy stuff! they will be perfect to add a cute tough to any fall/winter outfit!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiko Clements

customer_reviews.title: These are a must have
customer_reviews.text: Love these boot cuffs and don't have to wait for laundry day to ware them more than once a week If they match my outfit for the day I can put them on and dosen't matter which pair of my boots I grab 6" or 14" tall never have to bunch my socks up in my boot or try to streach them to make it to the top have had them since christmas
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bought these socks for my daughter-in-law, who wears cowboy boots (wore them in her wedding in fact). She likes them. They are comfortable and look pretty with her boots.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Cass

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I actually wear these as arm warmers. They're super cute and comfy, and work great for covering up tattoos at work. I want them in every color now!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Garza

customer_reviews.title: This was my something blue for our wedding. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my something blue for our wedding. The lace stuck out over my cowboy boots perfectly. I will say, that if you have larger calves, you may need to look for different socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Decker

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: There is really noting I dislike about these socks! They're soft and comfortable, perfect to wear for daily use or with renaissance costumes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for plus size
customer_reviews.text: They were super cute but not for girls with big calves. Not stretchy up at the top. Boooo
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Fox

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love the turquoise colour. These can be worn in winter or going into spring. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: DebOrrah

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great.
customer_reviews.text: Well I have since seen these for sale much cheaper but it wasn't amazon prime and the shipping dates were a month out. The fit was tight and non adjustable but within a hour they had stretched out and fell inside the boot. Overall they work, but they should have been made with more of a normal sock stretch to it. Cute though... Good for pictures or photo shoots.
customer_reviews.author: queenpineberryTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Really completes your look- soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so soft and warm without being too thick. I'm able to wear them with jeggings and zip up boots without any issues closing the boot. Some have mentioned that they're too long and while if I were to pull them up all the way, they'd go to mid thigh, I think that's a good idea. Some people wear thigh high boots and these socks will work with varied height boots. I wear boots that go up to almost my knee and these look perfect with them. Love!!
customer_reviews.author: LBAyres

customer_reviews.title: Cute & versatile, runs just a bit large
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. They are tall, so they will peek out over knee boots, or you can wear them scrunched down with booties. The fabric is stretchy so they will fit over leggings or skinny jeans too. The foot portion runs large. I wear a size 9 boot (8 or 8-1/2 shoe), and the sock heel was about half inch longer than my foot.
customer_reviews.author: ksatco

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest socks ever.
customer_reviews.text: These are just about the prettiest socks I've ever owned. I can imagine so many ways these socks could accessorize a wardrobe. The lace top is a little tight but I was fairly sure that would be the case. The socks are still really comfortable. I'm currently about a size 16. I don't think that these would fit very heavy legs.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute they stay up well only complaint is there not as warm as I'd like them to be
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute !
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t worn yet but really cute socks for under boots ! Quality appears good.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks!!! I wear them like a slouch sock with leggins. So feminine and pretty
customer_reviews.author: Forlornmyth

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute, stylish and cozy, I get tons of compliments on them every time I wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and super soft
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo cute! Super soft and they fit just great! I have athletic calves and these fit just great! Very dainty and the bow adds the cutest touch. I'm 5'2 and they go above my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughters wedding day, she wore her favorite pair of boots so figured I would get her a new pair of nice socks. She loved them and they are exactly what I was expecting. They fit her perfectly and looked beautiful. When my son in law went for the garter, we got a glimpse of the socks they were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: SylRod

customer_reviews.title: Super long
customer_reviews.text: Huge. These are supposed to go to your knees but they go half way up my thigh. I’m relatively tall, 5’8” and didn’t expect them to be so long.
customer_reviews.author: skizzle56

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love my cute socks!! Very comfy and color is on point to what I saw online!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but no stretch in the lace
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute, but keep in mind that the lace on the top does not stretch. I don't have overly large calves and still found them to be tight even on the lower part of my legs.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Button boot socks
customer_reviews.text: These are cute except both sets of buttons are on the same side of sock. Vs. being on opposite sides to look balanced. I love the lace, but in future will order those without buttons (unless they correct & put them on opposite sides of socks
customer_reviews.author: klsonsky

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty! I got the aqua. They fit great! I wear a women's size 7 shoe. I have very muscular legs and I'm so glad these are stretchy enough to to fit my 15 inch calves. They can be worn bellow the knee or pulled up over the knee but then they feel a little tight. I will definitely get more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were actual socks
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize there were literal holes all throughout the socks and they tear easy. They are so thin and basically serve no purpose since they make your feet sweat more or don't keep them warm at all. After one wash the bows on the top have curled under. They are still cute, but I wish they were actual socks, I blame that more on me for not paying more attention to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Trautman

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned when I saw them that they wouldn't fit over my calves. But, they fir just right and are super comfy! Glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: theresa_Mae

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I wore these with a dress and boots. They like to slide down, but what socks dont. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: alona

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These are made for women with chicken legs instead of human legs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! The only part I'm a little disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! The only part I'm a little disappointed on is they go up just past my knees which won't allow me to wear these with my boots. They look almost like thigh high socks, and I am not a short person! I am 5'9" and have long legs. I will still wear them though possibly with some of my skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinta Mae

customer_reviews.title: Two Left Feet!  😔
customer_reviews.text: The buttons were both on the same side of the socks! It was like getting two left feet! Had to return!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide calves.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, definitely not ment for wide calves though. Which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Ivory lace and ivory sock are different colors. disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I got the ivory pair and I am irritated that the leg part and the lace part are two notionally different ivory/cream colors. They aren't even close. It looks like light tan on a yellowish cream sock. I wish I would have gotten a color now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle NTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not too thick
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and unlike a lot of boot toppers they are not too thick. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: These socks are exactly as I hoped/expected them to be. I’m very pleased! Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin in Indy

customer_reviews.title: A real miss :-(
customer_reviews.text: I have had these on my wish list for AGES and finally decided to byy them for myself in anticipation of thencooler weather...Disappointed. I ordered the ivory ones and got gray woolen knitted ones that did not match the picture at all. I ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Renee G.

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute style and....
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5ft 1 so they come up just a little past my knee but I'm glad they do. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: They r strong, cute,and good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, and can wear either boots or no boot . The soft sock,stocking can be worn alone. I recommend them. Very sexy cute! If you have a boyfriend or husband. Tampa Florida has crazy weather. You need them.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Simple, cute, look good
customer_reviews.text: I gave 2 pairs of these as a gift. It's a little late to get much wear out of them until this fall/winter but she liked how they looked and plans to use them when we get back to colder weather in the midwestern United States.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my grown granddaughter for Christmas! They are BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Chellie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Calf a little small. Beautiful boot socks!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boot sock. ❤️ how it’s not too thin and not too thick. Sock itself stretches good everywhere except calf. Now I do have larger calf’s. Giving 4 stars only for this reason. I got the beige and it’s beautiful with boots!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for big calves
customer_reviews.text: Finally, boot socks that fit my 14.5 inch calves. Many socks and boots cut off my circulation but not these.
customer_reviews.author: Whostine16

customer_reviews.title: Burgundy NOT Burgundy
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I got these socks because the color that I wanted and saw on my screen is NOT the same color I received. I understand the colors vary from one device to another but I figured since the color "says" burgundy, that it would be well....burgundy. This is a TRUE RED color!! They didn't make a mistake and sent me the wrong color because the label on the socks do in fact say burgundy. Enough about the color, the socks are also thin. Cute but thin. I'm keeping since I'm sure I'll end up using them just not this weekend like I intended...color doesnt go. Bummer....
customer_reviews.author: ZoeGirlTop Contributor: Pets

KEEP THEM BEAUTIFUL - Hand wash + air dry. The soft knit won't pile easily like other brands! 95% Cotton, 5% Spandex
PERFECT FIT - One size fits most. Measure 15-17" heel to top. Comfortably fits calves up to 17" around
